data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Ping, Xie, Guanglin, Wang, Wenkai (2019): A new species of Pseudoechthistatus Pic, 1917 (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lamiinae) from Yunnan, China. Zootaxa 4619 (1): 184-188, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4619.1.10|3 occurrences
